First, we need to determine when Tickle Me Elmo was popular. Tickle Me Elmo was first released in 1996 and became especially popular during the Christmas season of that year. 

Next, we need to determine Snoop Dogg's birthdate. Snoop Dogg was born on October 20, 1971. 

To calculate Snoop Dogg's age during the popularity of Tickle Me Elmo, we need to subtract his birth year from the year Tickle Me Elmo was released. 

1996 (year Tickle Me Elmo was released) - 1971 (Snoop Dogg's birth year) = 25 

So, Snoop Dogg was 25 years old when Tickle Me Elmo was popular, which means he was an adult at that time. 

Therefore, the correct answer is (A) yes.
